android.car

类 CarInfoManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.CarManagerBase
      • android.car.CarInfoManager
  • 已过时。 
    Use CarPropertyManager instead.

    @Deprecated
public final class CarInfoManager
extends CarManagerBase
    Utility to retrieve various static information from car. Each data are grouped as Bundle and relevant data can be checked from Bundle using pre-specified keys.

    • 字段详细资料

      • BASIC_INFO_KEY_MANUFACTURER

        public static final int BASIC_INFO_KEY_MANUFACTURER
        已过时。 
        Key for manufacturer of the car. Passed in basic info Bundle.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • BASIC_INFO_KEY_MODEL

        public static final int BASIC_INFO_KEY_MODEL
        已过时。 
        Key for model name of the car. This information may not necessarily allow distinguishing different car models as the same name may be used for different cars depending on manufacturers. Passed in basic info Bundle.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • BASIC_INFO_KEY_MODEL_YEAR

        public static final int BASIC_INFO_KEY_MODEL_YEAR
        已过时。 
        Key for model year of the car in AD. Passed in basic info Bundle.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • BASIC_INFO_KEY_VEHICLE_ID

        public static final java.lang.String BASIC_INFO_KEY_VEHICLE_ID
        已过时。 
        Key for unique identifier for the car. This is not VIN, and id is persistent until user resets it. Passed in basic info Bundle.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • BASIC_INFO_FUEL_TYPES

        public static final int BASIC_INFO_FUEL_TYPES
        已过时。 
        Key for Fuel Types. This is an array of fuel types the vehicle supports. Passed in basic info Bundle.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

        public static final int BASIC_INFO_EV_CONNECTOR_TYPES

    • 方法详细资料

      • getManufacturer

        public java.lang.String getManufacturer()
        已过时。 
        返回:
        Manufacturer of the car. Empty if not available.

      • getModel

        public java.lang.String getModel()
        已过时。 
        返回:
        Model name of the car, empty if not available. This information may not necessarily allow distinguishing different car models as the same name may be used for different cars depending on manufacturers.

      • getModelYear

        @Deprecated
public java.lang.String getModelYear()
        已过时。 Use getModelYearInInteger() instead.
        返回:
        Model year of the car in AD. Empty if not available.

      • getModelYearInInteger

        public int getModelYearInInteger()
        已过时。 
        返回:
        Model year of the car in AD. 0 if not available.

      • getVehicleId

        @Deprecated
public java.lang.String getVehicleId()
        已过时。 no support for car's identifier
        返回:
        always return empty string.

      • getFuelCapacity

        public float getFuelCapacity()
        已过时。 
        返回:
        Fuel capacity of the car in milliliters. 0 if car doesn't run on fuel.

      • getFuelTypes

        public int[] getFuelTypes()
        已过时。 
        返回:
        Array of FUEL_TYPEs available in the car. Empty array if no fuel types available.

      • getEvBatteryCapacity

        public float getEvBatteryCapacity()
        已过时。 
        返回:
        Battery capacity of the car in Watt-Hour(Wh). Return 0 if car doesn't run on battery.

      • getEvConnectorTypes

        public int[] getEvConnectorTypes()
        已过时。 
        返回:
        Array of EV_CONNECTOR_TYPEs available in the car. Empty array if no connector types available.

      • getDriverSeat

        public int getDriverSeat()
        已过时。 
        返回:
        Driver seat's location. Returns VehicleAreaSeat.SEAT_UNKNOWN if the sensor is not available.

      • getEvPortLocation

        public int getEvPortLocation()
        已过时。 
        返回:
        EV port location of the car. Returns PortLocationType.UNKNOWN if the sensor is not available.

      • getFuelDoorLocation

        public int getFuelDoorLocation()
        已过时。 
        返回:
        Fuel door location of the car.Returns PortLocationType.UNKNOWN if the sensor is not available.

      • onCarDisconnected

        public void onCarDisconnected()
        已过时。 
        从类复制的说明: CarManagerBase
        Handle disconnection of car service (=crash). As car service has crashed already, this call should only clean up any listeners / callbacks passed from client. Clearing object passed to car service is not necessary as car service has crashed. Note that Car*Manager will not work any more as all binders are invalid. Client should re-create all Car*Managers when car service is restarted.
        指定者:
        onCarDisconnected 在类中 CarManagerBase
